meanings.sent1: My birthday falls in the midmonth of December.
meanings.sent2: We usually receive our paychecks around midmonth.
meanings.sent3: The midmonth of the year is a popular time for vacations.
meanings.sent4: In the midmonth of the calendar, time seems to pass quickly.
meanings.sent5: The midmonth is a time of balance between the beginning and end of a month.
